si.title: මඩකලපුව දිස්ත්රික්කයේ තැපැල් ඡන්දය ප්රකාශ කිරීම

en.title: Postal Voting of the Batticaloa District

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Postal Voting of the Batticaloa District in approximately 200 characters:

Batticaloa District postal voting system: Secure ballot boxes distributed across region; voters deposit ballots at designated centers; results tabulated centrally. Ensures accessibility for remote communities.
